Name: Xentripetal Force
About the game: Xentripetal Force is an action game that let's you and your friends experience a competitive survival match that takes place in outer space. Modes: Survival Mode Insane Survival Mode Scoring Mode Insane Scoring Mode 1 Ball Mode XL Ball Mode Features: 7 Playable Characters. Smart AI Randomized environment
